snippet: Raphia Smith recently lost a job and her family’s Brooklyn apartment, but she continues to pursue the goal of full-time employment.
abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund,  awards grants to Raphia Smith and her mother Annmarie Greaves to help them apply for a change of status from permanent residents to United States citizens.
lead_paragraph: Raphia Smith recently lost a job and her family’s Brooklyn apartment, but she continues to pursue the goal of full-time employment.

headline.print_headline: Despite Obstacles, Studying and Working Hard
headline.seo: Developmental Disabilities Have Not Deterred Jamaican Immigrant
headline.main: Despite Obstacles, Studying and Working Hard
